pointings – define pointing networks for telescope¶

pointing¶

pointings

telescope: define the name and a pointing list for one telescope inherient from tilings and galaxies

Tilings¶

tilings([logger])

tilings: Generate, read and process tilings

tilings.generatep(self, \*\*kwargs)

generate pointings by tiling sky

tilings.readp(self, filename[, filetype, …])

read pointings from file

tilings.removep_coo(self, ra, dec, fovra, fovdec)

remove fields by input coordinate

tilings.removep_file(self[, split, nest, …])

remove fields by input file

tilings.savep(self, filename[, filetype, …])

save tilings to a file

tilings.divide_OB(self, obra, obdec, \*\*kwargs)

divide each tiling to a serious of sub-tilings

Galaxies¶

galaxies([logger])

galaxies: Generate (by querying astropy.Vizier), read and process galaxies

galaxies.generatep(self, \*\*kwargs)

generate galaxies by querying Vizier

galaxies.readp(self, filename[, filetype, …])

read pointings from file

galaxies.removep_coo(self, ra, dec, fovra, …)

remove fields by input coordinate

galaxies.removep_file(self[, split, nest, …])

remove fields by input file

galaxies.savep(self, filename[, filetype, …])

save tilings to a file

galaxies.galaxies2hpmap(self[, tracer, …])

build a healpix map with KBGetGalaxies.data
